statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 100
SELECT post_text, likes FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, post_timestamp FROM social_media_data WHERE shares < 50
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%fun%'
SELECT id, likes, shares FROM social_media_data WHERE post_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC
SELECT post_text, likes FROM social_media_data WHERE post_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND likes > 50 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT id, post_text, post_timestamp FROM social_media_data WHERE shares BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY post_timestamp
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%inspirational%' AND likes < 50 ORDER BY likes ASC, shares DESC
SELECT id, post_timestamp, shares FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text NOT LIKE '%spam%' AND likes > 20 ORDER BY shares DESC, post_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT brand_name, engagement_level FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT platform, likes, shares FROM SocialMediaMetrics ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT brand_name, engagement_level FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE engagement_level > 100 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE brand_name = 'Nike' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis JOIN SocialMediaMetrics ON BrandSentimentAnalysis.id = SocialMediaMetrics.post_id;

SELECT brand_name, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis JOIN SocialMediaMetrics ON BrandSentimentAnalysis.id = SocialMediaMetrics.post_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentiment;
SELECT brand_id, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment WHERE engagement_level > 50;
SELECT engagement_level, brand_id FROM BrandSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT brand_id FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_name, sentiment_score, engagement_level FROM BusinessIntelligence WHERE analysis_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM BrandSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, engagement_level ASC;
SELECT brand_id, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE brand_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessIntelligence WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC, engagement_level DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_name FROM BusinessIntelligence WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM comments WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, like_date FROM likes WHERE post_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 4 AND post_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_likes > 5 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT post_content, post_timestamp, post_likes FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_location, user_followers FROM user_profiles WHERE user_followers > 10000;
SELECT brand_id, engagement_score, engagement_type FROM brand_engagement_analysis WHERE engagement_score > 0.8;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner, dashboard_last_updated FROM analytics_dashboard;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT brand_name, engagement_level FROM brand_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_followers FROM user_profiles WHERE user_followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM brand_engagement_analysis WHERE brand_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j';
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_owner FROM analytics_dashboard WHERE dashboard_last_updated > '2022-01-01';
